Package org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.neutrino

Class SynchronousNeutrinoAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.API
      • org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.SynchronousAPI
        • org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.neutrino.SynchronousNeutrinoAPI
  • public class SynchronousNeutrinoAPI
extends SynchronousAPI
    API Class for generating synchronous API calls to LDN server using wrapped objects. Created by Philip Vendil.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.API

        channel, DEFAULT_MAX_INBOUND_MESSAGE_SIZE, log, performValidation, statusExceptionWrapper, wrapperFactory

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SynchronousNeutrinoAPI​(io.grpc.ManagedChannel channel)
      Constructor used for setting up a connection using a GRPC managed channel that can be customized.

      Constructor for setting up a connection with LND Application with more flexible SSL context parameters.
      SynchronousNeutrinoAPI​(java.lang.String host, int port, java.io.File trustedServerCertificate, java.io.File macaroonFile)
      Minimal constructor for setting up a connection with LND Application.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SynchronousNeutrinoAPI

        public SynchronousNeutrinoAPI​(java.lang.String host,
                              int port,
                              java.io.File trustedServerCertificate,
                              java.io.File macaroonFile)
                       throws javax.net.ssl.SSLException,
                              ClientSideException
        Minimal constructor for setting up a connection with LND Application.
        Parameters:
        host - the hostname of ldn application
        port - the port of the application.
        trustedServerCertificate - a link of the SSL certificate used by the LND Application.
        macaroonFile - the file pointing to the macaroon to use, or null if no macaroons are used.
        Throws:
        javax.net.ssl.SSLException - if problems occurred setting up the SSL Connection.
        ClientSideException - if problems occurred reading the macaroon file.

      • SynchronousNeutrinoAPI

        public SynchronousNeutrinoAPI​(java.lang.String host,
                              int port,
                              io.grpc.netty.shaded.io.netty.handler.ssl.SslContext sslContext,
                              MacaroonContext macaroonContext)
        Constructor for setting up a connection with LND Application with more flexible SSL context parameters.
        Parameters:
        host - the hostname of ldn application
        port - the port of the application.
        sslContext - the SSL Context used when connecting the LND Application.
        macaroonContext - the macaroon context to use.

      • SynchronousNeutrinoAPI

        public SynchronousNeutrinoAPI​(io.grpc.ManagedChannel channel)
        Constructor used for setting up a connection using a GRPC managed channel that can be customized.
        Parameters:
        channel - the managed channel to use.

      • getBlockHeader

        public GetBlockHeaderResponse getBlockHeader​(java.lang.String hash)
                                      throws StatusException,
                                             ValidationException
        Method to generate a getBlockHeader request.
        Returns:
        a wrapped GetBlockHeaderResponse
        Throws:
        StatusException - if problems occurred in underlying GRPC call. Can be of one of three sub exceptions
      • ClientSideException: if problems was found in the request data, such as invalid or unexpected data.
      • ServerSideException: if server side problems was detected when processing the request.
      • CommunicationException: if communication related problems occurred during the call.
        • ValidationException - if validation problems found in request or response data.
        See Also:
